pr_title: HDDS-4252. Add the current layout versions to DN - SCM proto payload.

timeline.message: HDDS-4252. Add the current layout versions to DN - SCM proto payload.

timeline.bodyText: As OMStorage has om id(uuid), SCMStorageConfig has scm id(uuid). Can we also set/get datanode id (datanode uuid) as NodeProperties here?
timeline.author: linyiqun

replies.bodyText: Yes, it can be added over time as needed.
replies.author: prashantpogde

timeline.bodyText: The variable name containerId seems not related, can we rename to finalizeUpgrade?
timeline.author: linyiqun

timeline.bodyText:
Can we add a new constructor method without HDDSLayoutVersionManager passed in?
By default case, it can extract from DatanodeStateMachine.
HeartbeatEndpointTask(EndpointStateMachine rpcEndpoint, ConfigurationSource conf, StateContext context,
HDDSLayoutVersionManager versionManager) should only be visible for test.
timeline.author: linyiqun

replies.bodyText: ok. I will add another constructor.
replies.author: prashantpogde

timeline.bodyText: Same review comment for RegisterEndpointTask construction method like above.
timeline.author: linyiqun

replies.bodyText: yup, I will add another constructor.
replies.author: prashantpogde

timeline.author: linyiqun

timeline.bodyText: Same suggestion comment for constructor method like above.
timeline.author: linyiqun

timeline.bodyText: Nit. Can we return empty list here?
timeline.author: avijayanhwx

timeline.bodyText: There is already a Datanode Version file managed by the org.apache.hadoop.ozone.container.common.helpers.DatanodeVersionFile class. This is supposed to manage the clusterId, Datanode ID, layout version etc. If we create a new class to be passed into the Layout Version Manager, then we end up creating 2 Version files on disk for DN.
timeline.author: avijayanhwx

replies.bodyText:
Earlier I was thinking of refactoring that so that the mechanism is consistent across OM/SCM/Datanode.
But I will go ahead and used the DataNodeVersionFile for now.
replies.author: prashantpogde

timeline.bodyText: Why do we need to create a new 'register' method with Layout Version arg, without changing the existing method? We would always need a Layout Version during registering.
timeline.author: avijayanhwx
